class.descriptionEN: A class that can communicate with the gridnav, useful for seeing if stuff should be able to move
class.descriptionCN: 与网格信息通信的类，用于检测充填物是否可以通行

function.name: GridPosToWorldCenterX
function.DescriptionEN: Get the X position of the center of a given X index
function.DescriptionCN: 获取指定X索引号的世界中心X位置（网格到世界）

function.name: GridPosToWorldCenterY
function.DescriptionEN: Get the Y position of the center of a given Y index
function.DescriptionCN: 获取指定Y索引号的世界中心Y位置（网格到世界）

function.name: IsBlocked
function.DescriptionEN: Checks whether the given position is blocked
function.DescriptionCN: 检查给定位置是否被阻挡

function.name: IsNearbyTree
function.signature: bool IsNearbyTree(Vector position, float radius, bool c)

HowToCall.Parameter: Vector position, float radius, bool c

function.name: IsTraversable
function.DescriptionEN: Checks whether the given position is traversable
function.DescriptionCN: 检查给予维持是否可通过

function.name: WorldToGridPosX
function.DescriptionEN: Get the X index of a given world X position
function.DescriptionCN: 获取指定世界X位置的X索引（世界到网格）

function.name: WorldToGridPosY
function.DescriptionEN: Get the Y index of a given world Y position
function.DescriptionCN: 获取指定世界Y位置的Y索引（世界到网格）
